Title: Malicious
Writer: Salvatore Samperi (story), Ottavio Jemma (screenplay), Salvatore Samperi (screenplay), Alessandro Parenzo (screenplay)
Actors: Laura Antonelli, Turi Ferro, Alessandro Momo, Tina Aumont
Plot: A widower and his sons fall in love with Angela (Laura Antonelli), the beautiful housekeeper. Each man uses his particular way to approach and capture the - apparently innocent and naive - young woman, and to see more of her sexy body. But only one of them succeeds in dominating and conquering her.
